job.name: Speaker Recognition
job.description: Welcome to the Microsoft Speaker Recognition APIs. Speaker Recognition APIs are cloud-based APIs that provide the most advanced algorithms for speaker verification and speaker identification. Speaker Recognition can be divided into two categories: speaker verification and speaker identification.
